response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. It's a unique opportunity to acquire an item that holds significant value for me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. Given its worth to both of us, I propose a fair price of $10,000. This offer reflects a balance between the intrinsic value of the product and my desire to recoup a reasonable return on my investment. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 10000}
